about_the_game:
The Game


A nameless fallen warrior, not buried according to the rite and raised by a powerful ancient witch, becomes a mindless tool to help her achieve goals hidden behind an arcane veil.
By exploring the world and becoming stronger, the hero will get an opportunity to gain will and start to pursue his own goals, willingly side with the witch or her equally obscure opponents, or remain a puppet, driven by the will of ancient forces.

The world of the game is a hidden domain of embodied ideas, the materialization of mythological tropes, human fears and aspirations that have taken on flesh.
A crucial part of the plot and gameplay will also be the Shadow Realm - the unstable state of this world, where fears and aspirations are not yet fully realized and formalized.
The setting is inspired in many aspects by Slavic culture and mythology.

Features


  • A world tailored from several radically different settings, allowing you to freely move between locations to advance through the plot, explore and find secrets.

  • At any moment hero is able to shift to the Shadow Realm - an unstable and distorted state of the world, inhabited by even stranger creatures, allowing one to overcome otherwise impassable obstacles and hiding many treasures and answers to questions.
  • Intense combat based on the search and exploitation of enemy weaknesses and use of different combat techniques, including dodging, rolling, blocking, parrying and using the features of various types of weapons.
  • Special acquired skills that will not only allow you to overcome previously impassable obstacles, but will also be woven into the combat system, expanding the arsenal of available techniques and their combinations.
  • Secrets stuffed with secrets with a secret sauce.
  • A modular equipment system that includes body armor, helmets, arm and leg armor, amulets, shields, one-handed, two-handed and ranged weapons.
  • A system for developing combat and magical skills that allows you to form your preferred fighting style.

name: Trizna

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 270X (4096 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64, Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 (8192 MB) / Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: “Trizna” is a classic plot-driven 2.5D metroidvania filled with intense battles utilizing the unique features of weapons, evasions, parries, and counterattacks. Explore the mysterious and eerie realm deeply intertwined with pagan beliefs, with blade, magic and a keen mind.
